Trainer
================

These configs configure PyTorch Lightning ``Trainer`` objects.

.. seealso::
   :py:mod:`lightning`

.. note::
    To use an alternative trainer config, use a command like:

    .. code-block:: bash

        python src/train.py trainer=<TRAINER_NAME> encoder=gvp dataset=cath task=inverse_folding

    where ``<TRAINER_NAME>`` is the name of the trainer config.


Default (``default``)
----------------------

.. code-block:: bash

   # Example usage
   python src/train.py ... trainer.max_epochs=1000
